answerRangeEmptyStateDetailed: Don’t worry! we made it easy for you! just click the button below and create your first template
answerRangeKitDesignerDescription: Before beginning the design and creation of questionnaires and questions, you can create templates for answer options in your kit. These templates will allow you to build questions more quickly and efficiently and will be accessible during the question creation process. Each template includes the number and title of the options, as well as the percentage each option contributes to the overall question score

assessmentFocusDescription: This assessment focuses on {{subjectsCount}} key areas: {{subjects}}. A detailed analysis is conducted on {{attributesCount}} attributes related to these areas.
assessmentFocusDescriptionLastSection: The following table provides a brief description of the subjects and their attributes.
assessmentMethodologyDescription: The {{title}}is a framework designed to estimate {{subjects}} based on the tools used in the development process. It assesses tools across {{maturityLevelsCount}} maturity levels, directly impacting {{subjects}}.
AttributeEmptyStateDetailed: Don’t worry! we made it easy for you! just click the button below and create your first attribute
attributesAreConsidered: {{length}} attributes are considered. Maturity level and confidence level have been evaluated for each of them.
attributesKitDesignerDescription:
Attributes are the most critical components of an evaluation. The maturity level of an evaluation is determined based on the maturity levels of the subjects and by calculating their weighted average. Each subject consists of several attributes, and its score is derived from the weighted average of these attributes.
In this section, you can define the subjects relevant to your evaluation, add the necessary descriptions for them, and finally, determine the weight of each subject in the final calculation of the evaluation's maturity level.
changeOrderHelper: You can drag each item to change order (This order is descending)
commentsWillNotBeShown: comments will not be shown in the report page
completeSomeOfQuestionnaires: Complete some of the questionnaires to get basic insights.
createAnAssessmentWith: Create an assessment with your desired assessment kit, answer it's questions and view the insights.

defaultInsightTemplate: This insight has been automatically generated from the assessment results and should be confirmed by an assessor.

if you dont see any answer it means no assessor ever answered this question so far.

evidenceIsLimited: Each evidence is limited to five attachments. If you need to add more, simply create a new evidence and add continue from there.

inTheRadarChartBelow: In the radar chart below, you can view {{title}} attributes maturity level.

invalidInsight: This insight may not be valid due to changes in some responses and needs to be verified or updated by an assesor.
invitationSentSuccessfully: The invitation has been sent successfully
kitCustomDefaultDataChanged: Default data hasn't been changed since last update.
kitCustomTitleEmpty: Kit custom title can not be empty

kitValidated: All good! The kit has been successfully validated and is ready to be released.
maturityLevelsDescriptionLastSection: This assessment kit evaluates the maturity of subjects and attributes across multiple levels.
maturityLevelsKitDesignerDescrption:
Maturity levels are a structured way to assess and improve the development and capabilities of processes, systems, or organizations. Typically, these levels are part of a maturity model, which provides a framework for evaluating how well an entity is performing in a specific domain.
In this section, in addition to defining the various maturity levels, you need to establish the relationship between these levels and the criteria for achieving each maturity level based on the preceding levels.
maturityLevelsListEmptyState: Oops! No maturity level is defined.
maturityLevelsListEmptyStateDatailed: No Maturity level at the moment? You can define new ones via this button!
moreAboutQuestion: Want to know more about this question?
moreQuestionsNeedToBeAnswered: More questions need to be answered to view the report.
name: Name
needsToAddAttachments: Needs to add attachments (after being created)
needStrongPassword: Your password should contain at least one special character and one capital character
networkError: Sorry! We can't connect to the server. Please check your internet connection.

noComment: No comment has been noted yet!

notificationEmptyState: Nothing new to see here yet!
oneFileOnly: You can only upload one file at a time.
optionsEmptyStateDetailed: Options are necessary to create questions! Create your first option here
optionsImpactsDescription: Impact actually indicates how and to what extent the options of a question affect various attributes. This effect can vary across different maturity levels, meaning an option can have different impacts on multiple attributes at different maturity levels. The maximum impact weight of an option is 1.
optionsImpactsDisabled: You can't add a new impact untill you've created options and attributes
optionsImpactsEmptyState: No Attribute is impacted by this question yet!
optionsImpactsEmptyStateDetailed: A question has to impact at least 1 attribute to be created and added to the questionnaire.
overallStatusDetails: You can find detailed statuses accross {{attributes}} attributes in {{subjects}} key subjects.
overallStatusReportDescription: The overall system status has been evaluated as "{{maturityLevelTitle}}". This result is based on responses to {{questionCentext}}, with a confidence level of {{confidenceValue}}%. The status is determined using a weighted average algorithm applied to the scores of various assessment subjects.
pleaseCheckYouEmail: Please check your email to verify your account
pleaseCompleteAllQuestionnaires: Please complete more questionnaires to get a better accuracy.
pleaseCompleteAllSubjectQuestionnaires: Please complete all {{subjectName}} questionnaires to make it more accurate.
pleaseNoteThatThereAreSomeLimitations: Please note that there are some limitations in place for modifying the content of the kit, and right now there is no support for some changes.The unsupported cases include:
publishDescription: In this section, the content of the kit is automatically reviewed and validated. If no errors are found, you can release the kit and make it available. If there are any errors, you need to resolve them before the kit can be released.
question: Question
questionAndOptionsDescription: In this section, enter the question text and its options. If desired, you can also add a hint or additional explanation for the question in the 'hint' section. For easier input of options, you can create a new template and reuse it in other questions, or use templates that have been previously created.
questionnairesAssessmentKitDescription: To measure the maturity level in this assessment kit, a bunch of questions are asked.These questions are categorized into the following {{questionnairesCount}} questionnaires.
questionnairesDescription: To measure the maturity level of each subject and its attributes {{questionnairesCount}} questionnaires, including a total of {{questionsCount}} questions, are prepared. During the assessment process, each question will be scored. Each question may affect the score of one or more subject attributes. The following table presents these questionnaires.
questionnairesEmptyStateDetailed: Questionnaires are necessary to create questions! Create your first questionnaires here
questionnairesKitDesignerDescription: Questionnaires provide a structure for organizing and categorizing various questions. By dividing an assessment into different questionnaires, evaluators who intend to use your kit can navigate and utilize your assessment more easily. Questions can be categorized in various ways, but the most common method is by topic. In this way, questions that are most similar in terms of the topic are grouped into one questionnaire. It is recommended that each questionnaire contains a maximum of 15 questions and a minimum of 3 questions.
questionsArentCompleteSoAICantBeGenerate: Attribute insights can't be provided until all the assessment questions have been answered.
releaseNote: Note: All changes you made are saved automatically in draft.
removeMemberExpertGroup: Are you sure you want to remove this member?
selectedConfidenceLevel: Selected confidence level for this question is
shortTitleInfo: A very short title (a few characters) for addressing the product under assessment in reports.
showsOverallStatusOfSystem: Shows overall status of your system
someQuestionsHaveNotBeenAnswered: Some questions have not been answered, which may affect the accuracy of the insights.
somethingSeemsOff: Something went wrong on our side We look into it as soon as we can.
sorryYouCanCreateAssessmentWithThisAsses: Sorry! You can't create assessment with this assessment kit.
spacesAreEssentialForCreating: Spaces are essential for creating and organizing your assessments. Additionally, you have the option to collaborate with others by adding them to spaces.
subjectAccordionDetails: You can find a detailed status of the {{subjects}} accross {{attributes}} attributes below.
subjectEmptyStateDetailed: No subjects in the kit so far? Create your first subject just by one click!
subjectListEmptyStateDatailed: No subjects in this kit so far? Create your first subject just by one click!
subjectsKitDesignerDescription:
Subjects are the most critical components of an evaluation. The maturity level of an evaluation is determined based on the maturity levels of the subjects and by calculating their weighted average. Each subject consists of several attributes, and its score is derived from the weighted average of these attributes.
In this section, you can define the subjects relevant to your evaluation, add the necessary descriptions for them, and finally, determine the weight of each subject in the final calculation of the evaluation's maturity level.
subjectsSectionTitle: The following sections address the detailed status of the assessment subjects and their attributes.
subjectStatusReportDescription:
One key aspect of this assessment is evaluating the maturity level of the {{title}}, which refers to {{description}}.
With {{confidenceValue}}% confidence, the overall maturity level of the {{title}} has been estimated at {{maturityLevelValue}} out of {{maturityLevelCount}}, indicating that it is {{maturityLevelTitle}}. The status is determined using a weighted average algorithm applied to the scores of various subject attributes.
{{attributesCount}} attributes of the {{title}} have been evaluated in this assessment. For each attribute, both the maturity level and the confidence level have been documented. The chart below illustrates the maturity levels of these attributes.
submitAnswerAutomaticallyAndGoToNextQues: Automatically go to the next question after submitting the answer.
successCreatedAssessmentMessage: For now, you're the only one who can see this assessment. You can grant access to others via the setting page.
theAchivedScores: The achieved scores from questions of each maturity level of this attribute
theAdvisorService: Advice refers to suggestions for improvement based on the assessment results and your goals. You can write it yourself or generate it automatically with AI.

evaluation_process: Evaluation Process (How Was This Report Built?)
disclaimerDescription: This report was produced with an evidence-based evaluation approach and partially relies on the information provided by the interviewees. The findings of this report will not be 100% certain. If the managers approve, the evaluation process will continue to examine the evidence more deeply and increase the confidence factor.
stepsDescription: The following steps describe the process.
participantDescription: The people who participated in this evaluation process are as follows.
topicsTable: The table below explains each of the topics and indicators.
maturityLevelsDescription: In this assessment kit, there are {{maturityLevelCount}} different maturity levels, each of which is defined in the table below. At the end of the assessment process, the maturity level of each indicator is determined.
assessmentKitDescription: To assess the system's status, the {{title}} assessment kit is used. This kit measures {{attributesCount}} main indicators across {{subjectsLength}} topics, namely {{subjects}}, and reports each indicator's score in the form of {{maturityLevelCount}} maturity levels. The kit consists of {{questionnairesCount}} questionnaires, each of which will be reviewed separately below.
assessmentStepsTooltip:
An assessment generally consists of three main steps: answering questions and completing questionnaires, submitting insights by analyzing the responses and results, and then suggesting advices based on the understanding of strengths and weaknesses.
To achieve the best results, it is recommended that one step should not begin until the previous step is completed.
whatToDoNowTooltip: In this section, the tasks to be done are listed according to the current step of the assessment.
whatToDoNextTooltip: In this section, the issues that need to be addressed in the next steps of the assessment are highlighted.
onlyThesePeopleHaveAccess: Only these people can view the report
shareReportViaEmail: Share the report with new people via email...

NoIssuesFound: No questionnaire has the selected issues
fillInAllRequired: Please fill in all sections first.
someAnswersNeedUpdating: Some scores and maturity levels have changed, so some of your answers may need updating.
writeStrengthAndRooms: Write about strength and rooms for improvement here...
writeStepsForAssessment: Write about Steps taken for this assessment here...
